{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Java Developer",
  "description": "QuPee Consult is an indigenous company that is into Admin, Consulting and HR services. We help our clients get the best human resources for their various available positions.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Java Developer

Job Location:&nbsp;Victoria Island, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess an HND / BSc Degree with 4 years of work experience.
	Candidates must be experienced in using JavaScript.
	Ability to deliver projects within less supervision.


Salary
N500,000 monthly.

Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;onyi.alums@yahoo.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",

Java Developer Job at QuPee Consult




        
    

        
        QuPee Consult is an indigenous company that is into Admin, Consulting and HR services. We help our clients get the best human resources for their various available positions.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Java Developer

Job Location: Victoria Island, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess an HND / BSc Degree with 4 years of work experience.
	Candidates must be experienced in using JavaScript.
	Ability to deliver projects within less supervision.


Salary
N500,000 monthly.
     

            
    



Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: onyi.alums@yahoo.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Nursing Care Coordinator",
  "description": "Oxen Hr Limited was registered in 2021 with the Care Quality Commission (CQC) to provide Personal Care to both younger and older adults. We care for people with dementia, mental health conditions, and physical disabilities. Our vision is to provide people with high-quality person-centred care. Thus, we have robust and effective strategies to deliver high-quality care that is personalized to meet the individual needs and preferences of our service users in a safe, caring, effective and responsive environment by a well-led workforce with the skills, knowledge, and resources to meet the highest possible standards.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Nursing Care Coordinator
Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos (Remote)
Employment Type: Full-time

Role Overview


	As a Nursing Care Coordinator, you will be responsible for coordinating care for patients, especially those with complex or long-term conditions, managing care schedules, liaising with clients and carers, and ensuring the highest standards of care are maintained.
	You will play a vital role in ensuring our clients receive timely and effective support while maintaining compliance with regulatory requirements.


Key Responsibilities


	Coordinate and navigate care across the health and social care system, connecting patients with the right teams and services at the right time to enable the delivery of person-centred care.
	Conduct comprehensive risk and needs assessments and develop personalized care and support plans based on what matters to patients.
	Ensure efficient allocation of care staff to meet patient needs and manage care schedules for clients using digital care management system.
	Work with GPs, other healthcare professionals, and community services to ensure a coordinated approach to patient care.
	Maintain health and social records of clients, review care notes, and ensure care plans and risk assessments are updated as needs change using digital care management system.


Requirements


	Bachelor of Nursing qualification.
	Previous experience in a care coordination or adult nursing role.
	Strong organisational and communication skills.
	Ability to work under pressure and manage multiple tasks.
	Proficiency in scheduling software and Microsoft Office.
	A caring and compassionate approach to work.
	Ability to work collaboratively within a team.
	Commitment to maintaining confidentiality and exercising discretion.


Benefits


	Commissions and performance bonus.
	Career progression opportunities.
	Supportive and friendly team environment.
	Ongoing training and development.


Job Offer:


	An estimated salary range of N150,000 - N200,000 per month.
	Flexible and hybrid working arrangements to promote work-life balance.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and Applications to:&nbsp;recruitment@oxenhr.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",
  "datePosted": "2025-10-15",
  "validThrough": "2025-11-01",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",
  "hiringOrganization": {
    "@type": "Organization",
    "name": "Oxen Hr Limited"
    
  },
  "jobLocation": {
    "@type": "Place",
    "address": {
      "@type": "PostalAddress",
       "postalCode": ". ",
       "addressRegion": ". ",
       "streetAddress": ". ",
      "addressLocality": "Lagos",
      "addressCountry": "NG"
     
      
    }
  },
  "identifier": {
    "@type": "PropertyValue",
    "name": "",
    "value": "188889"
  },
  "baseSalary": {
    "@type": "MonetaryAmount",
    "currency": "NGN",
    "value": {
      "@type": "QuantitativeValue",
      "minValue": 150000,
      "maxValue": 250000,
      "unitText": "MONTH"
    }
  }
}



Nursing Care Coordinator Job at Oxen Hr Limited




        
    

        
        Oxen Hr Limited was registered in 2021 with the Care Quality Commission (CQC) to provide Personal Care to both younger and older adults. We care for people with dementia, mental health conditions, and physical disabilities. Our vision is to provide people with high-quality person-centred care. Thus, we have robust and effective strategies to deliver high-quality care that is personalized to meet the individual needs and preferences of our service users in a safe, caring, effective and responsive environment by a well-led workforce with the skills, knowledge, and resources to meet the highest possible standards.
     

            
    



We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Nursing Care Coordinator
Job Location: Lagos (Remote)
Employment Type: Full-time

Role Overview


	As a Nursing Care Coordinator, you will be responsible for coordinating care for patients, especially those with complex or long-term conditions, managing care schedules, liaising with clients and carers, and ensuring the highest standards of care are maintained.
	You will play a vital role in ensuring our clients receive timely and effective support while maintaining compliance with regulatory requirements.


Key Responsibilities


	Coordinate and navigate care across the health and social care system, connecting patients with the right teams and services at the right time to enable the delivery of person-centred care.
	Conduct comprehensive risk and needs assessments and develop personalized care and support plans based on what matters to patients.
	Ensure efficient allocation of care staff to meet patient needs and manage care schedules for clients using digital care management system.
	Work with GPs, other healthcare professionals, and community services to ensure a coordinated approach to patient care.
	Maintain health and social records of clients, review care notes, and ensure care plans and risk assessments are updated as needs change using digital care management system.


Requirements


	Bachelor of Nursing qualification.
	Previous experience in a care coordination or adult nursing role.
	Strong organisational and communication skills.
	Ability to work under pressure and manage multiple tasks.
	Proficiency in scheduling software and Microsoft Office.
	A caring and compassionate approach to work.
	Ability to work collaboratively within a team.
	Commitment to maintaining confidentiality and exercising discretion.


Benefits


	Commissions and performance bonus.
	Career progression opportunities.
	Supportive and friendly team environment.
	Ongoing training and development.


Job Offer:


	An estimated salary range of N150,000 - N200,000 per month.
	Flexible and hybrid working arrangements to promote work-life balance.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and Applications to: recruitment@oxenhr.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply  
        

    
     




        
        

            
    




   


    
        Similar Jobs

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Receptionist",
  "description": "Kelsey Greene Villa, a premier hotel located in Oregun, Lagos, is&nbsp;recruiting suitably qualified candidates to fill the position below:

Job Position: Receptionist

Job Location:&nbsp;Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities
Front Desk Management:


	Greet visitors, guests, and clients warmly and professionally upon arrival.
	Ensure the reception area is clean, organized, and presentable at all times.
	Direct visitors to the appropriate staff or department.
	Maintain a pleasant and professional attitude as the first point of contact for the organization.


Communication Handling


	Answer, screen, and forward incoming calls courteously.
	Take and relay accurate messages in a timely manner.
	Handle email correspondence and distribute incoming mail or packages.
	Respond promptly to inquiries, both in person and over the phone.


Guest and Client Support


	Provide information about the company, its services, and facilities when requested.
	Assist guests or clients with directions, appointments, or general inquiries.
	Maintain a visitor log and issue identification badges when required.
	Schedule appointments and manage meeting room bookings.


Administrative Support


	Perform basic clerical duties such as filing, photocopying, and scanning documents.
	Maintain office supplies inventory and report when replenishment is needed.
	Support other departments with administrative tasks as requested.
	Assist with data entry and record keeping.


Coordination and Reporting


	Communicate effectively with housekeeping, security, and management teams to ensure smooth daily operations.
	Report maintenance or safety issues observed at the front area.
	Update staff or management on daily visitor flow and relevant front-desk information.


Professional Conduct:


	Maintain confidentiality of company and guest information.
	Adhere to company dress code and grooming standards.
	Display courtesy, patience, and professionalism in all interactions.
	Arrive punctually and manage time efficiently.


Qualifications


	Interested candidates should possess an SSCE qualification with 0-2 years of experience.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;hr.careers.kgl@gmail.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.",

Receptionist Job at KelseyGreene Properties




        
    

        
        Kelsey Greene Villa, a premier hotel located in Oregun, Lagos, is recruiting suitably qualified candidates to fill the position below:

Job Position: Receptionist

Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities
Front Desk Management:


	Greet visitors, guests, and clients warmly and professionally upon arrival.
	Ensure the reception area is clean, organized, and presentable at all times.
	Direct visitors to the appropriate staff or department.
	Maintain a pleasant and professional attitude as the first point of contact for the organization.


Communication Handling
     

            
    




	Answer, screen, and forward incoming calls courteously.
	Take and relay accurate messages in a timely manner.
	Handle email correspondence and distribute incoming mail or packages.
	Respond promptly to inquiries, both in person and over the phone.


Guest and Client Support


	Provide information about the company, its services, and facilities when requested.
	Assist guests or clients with directions, appointments, or general inquiries.
	Maintain a visitor log and issue identification badges when required.
	Schedule appointments and manage meeting room bookings.


Administrative Support


	Perform basic clerical duties such as filing, photocopying, and scanning documents.
	Maintain office supplies inventory and report when replenishment is needed.
	Support other departments with administrative tasks as requested.
	Assist with data entry and record keeping.


Coordination and Reporting


	Communicate effectively with housekeeping, security, and management teams to ensure smooth daily operations.
	Report maintenance or safety issues observed at the front area.
	Update staff or management on daily visitor flow and relevant front-desk information.


Professional Conduct:


	Maintain confidentiality of company and guest information.
	Adhere to company dress code and grooming standards.
	Display courtesy, patience, and professionalism in all interactions.
	Arrive punctually and manage time efficiently.


Qualifications


	Interested candidates should possess an SSCE qualification with 0-2 years of experience.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: hr.careers.kgl@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Data Analyst - Mining Operations",
  "description": "Zotmann International Limited (ZIL) is the holding company with core businesses across various sectors which include solid mineral development and mining (Palladium Mining Limited and Zotmann Mining Limited), trading (Rio Distributors Ltd), Manufacturing (VTE Company Limited) and real estate development (North star Homes Limited).

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Data Analyst - Mining Operations

Job Location:&nbsp;Ebonyi
Job type: Full-time

&nbsp;Job Summary


	&nbsp;We are seeking a detail-oriented and analytical Data Analyst to support mining operations by collecting, verifying, and analysing production and operational data.
	The ideal candidate will ensure the accuracy and integrity of data used for reporting, decision-making, and regulatory compliance.


Key Responsibilities


	Collect and input daily production metrics, including ore tonnage, ore grade, recovery rates, and waste volumes.
	Transcribe data from handwritten field notes, reports, or logs into digital formats using spreadsheets or mining-specific software.
	Maintain up-to-date records on equipment usage, fuel consumption, and maintenance activities.
	Verify data accuracy by cross-referencing source documents and conducting routine checks.
	Prepare and distribute daily, weekly, and monthly reports for internal stakeholders and external regulatory bodies.
	Collaborate with operational teams such as engineers, supervisors, geologists, and surveyors to resolve data gaps or discrepancies.
	Ensure secure storage, backup, and confidentiality of all operational data in compliance with company policies.
	Assist with internal audits and quality control by providing timely and well-documented records.


Qualifications and Skills


	Bachelor&#39;s degree in Data Science, Mining Engineering, Statistics, or a related field.
	Proficient in Microsoft Excel and data management tools; experience with mining software (e.g., Surpac, Micromine, or similar) is a plus.
	Strong attention to detail with excellent organizational and analytical skills.
	Ability to work independently and collaborate effectively across departments.
	Familiarity with mining operations and production processes is an advantage.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;careers@zotmanninternationallimited.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email",

Data Analyst - Mining Operations Job at Zotmann International Limited




        
    

        
        Zotmann International Limited (ZIL) is the holding company with core businesses across various sectors which include solid mineral development and mining (Palladium Mining Limited and Zotmann Mining Limited), trading (Rio Distributors Ltd), Manufacturing (VTE Company Limited) and real estate development (North star Homes Limited).

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Data Analyst - Mining Operations

Job Location: Ebonyi
Job type: Full-time

 Job Summary
     

            
    




	 We are seeking a detail-oriented and analytical Data Analyst to support mining operations by collecting, verifying, and analysing production and operational data.
	The ideal candidate will ensure the accuracy and integrity of data used for reporting, decision-making, and regulatory compliance.


Key Responsibilities


	Collect and input daily production metrics, including ore tonnage, ore grade, recovery rates, and waste volumes.
	Transcribe data from handwritten field notes, reports, or logs into digital formats using spreadsheets or mining-specific software.
	Maintain up-to-date records on equipment usage, fuel consumption, and maintenance activities.
	Verify data accuracy by cross-referencing source documents and conducting routine checks.
	Prepare and distribute daily, weekly, and monthly reports for internal stakeholders and external regulatory bodies.
	Collaborate with operational teams such as engineers, supervisors, geologists, and surveyors to resolve data gaps or discrepancies.
	Ensure secure storage, backup, and confidentiality of all operational data in compliance with company policies.
	Assist with internal audits and quality control by providing timely and well-documented records.


Qualifications and Skills


	Bachelor's degree in Data Science, Mining Engineering, Statistics, or a related field.
	Proficient in Microsoft Excel and data management tools; experience with mining software (e.g., Surpac, Micromine, or similar) is a plus.
	Strong attention to detail with excellent organizational and analytical skills.
	Ability to work independently and collaborate effectively across departments.
	Familiarity with mining operations and production processes is an advantage.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: careers@zotmanninternationallimited.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email    

    

        Click here to Apply
